review: I only gave it two stars, because sometimes it works spectacularly, though rarely.It's terribly glichy and not the simplest to use. After a while, my phone/tablet/computer will forget it's controlling my chromecast altogether and it's a process to get everything sorted out. Can't pause, fast foward, etc. An actual remote probably would have solved this problem. Worst of all, after only 4 months of infrequent use, I've had to order (beg for) a replacement because it stopped loading any apps whatsoever. Haven't tested the new one enough to know if it's as glitchy.
author: Meghann J.
